trans-unit.source: title: Step 2: Install Hyper-V on Windows 10
trans-unit.target: title: Step 2: Install Hyper-V on Windows 10

trans-unit.source: Step 2: Install Hyper-V on Windows 10
trans-unit.target: Step 2: Install Hyper-V on Windows 10

trans-unit.source: Hyper-V can be installed using <link><linkText>Programs and Features</linkText><title></title></link> or <link><linkText>Windows Powershell</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Hyper-V can be installed using <link><linkText>Programs and Features</linkText><title></title></link> or <link><linkText>Windows Powershell</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Using Programs and Features
trans-unit.target: Using Programs and Features

trans-unit.source: Right-click the Windows button and then click Programs and Features.
trans-unit.target: Right-click the Windows button and then click Programs and Features.

trans-unit.source: Click Turn Windows features on or off.
trans-unit.target: Click Turn Windows features on or off.

trans-unit.source: Select Hyper-V, click OK
trans-unit.target: Select Hyper-V, click OK

trans-unit.source: When the installation is finished, you'll need to restart the computer.
trans-unit.target: When the installation is finished, you'll need to restart the computer.

trans-unit.source: Using PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Using PowerShell

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the PowerShell help for <link><linkText>Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see the PowerShell help for <link><linkText>Enable-WindowsOptionalFeature</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Click on the Windows button and search for Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Click on the Windows button and search for Windows PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: Right-click on Windows PowerShell and then click Run as Administrator.
trans-unit.target: Right-click on Windows PowerShell and then click Run as Administrator.

trans-unit.source: At the Windows Powerhshell prompt, type the following and then press the Enter key:
trans-unit.target: At the Windows Powerhshell prompt, type the following and then press the Enter key:

trans-unit.source: When the installation is finished, restart the computer.
trans-unit.target: When the installation is finished, restart the computer.

trans-unit.source: How do I know Hyper-V installed correctly?
trans-unit.target: How do I know Hyper-V installed correctly?

trans-unit.source: After you restart your computer start the Hyper-V Manager tool.
trans-unit.target: After you restart your computer start the Hyper-V Manager tool.

trans-unit.source: Click on the Windows button and type Hyper-V.
trans-unit.target: Click on the Windows button and type Hyper-V.

trans-unit.source: Click on Hyper-V Manager in the list.
trans-unit.target: Click on Hyper-V Manager in the list.

trans-unit.source: The Hyper-V Manager application should start.
trans-unit.target: The Hyper-V Manager application should start.

trans-unit.source: Next Step
trans-unit.target: Next Step

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Step 3: Create a virtual switch</linkText><title></title></link>
